title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] Cannot open file in another editor if it is already opened (should display warning message)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If a file is already opened in one editor, it should not be possible to open it in another editor. Currently, there is no warning message displayed when attempting to open a file in another editor that is already opened.
OB: When a file is opened in one editor, it is possible to open the same file in another editor without any warning message being displayed.
EB: However, there should be a warning message displayed when attempting to open a file in another editor that is already opened.
SR:
1. Open a file in an editor. 
2. Attempt to open the same file in another editor. 
3. Check if a warning message is displayed informing that the file is already opened in another editor.
